Package edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.environment

Contains classes which define the interface for environments which a framework Agent can sense from and perform actions in.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Environment Specification for domains that the framework can use as an environment.
 

Class Summary
EnvironmentImpl Abstract implementation of Environment Environments should not be a listener of anything besides GUIs.
 

Package edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.environment Description

Contains classes which define the interface for environments which a framework Agent can sense from and perform actions in.
